metadata.title: EWETON 2.0MP Hybrid 4-in-1 TVI/CVI/AHD/960H CCTV Home Surveillance Camera 3.6mm Lens 36PCS Infrared LEDs IR Cut 100ft Night Vision Indoor Outdoor Weatherproof Security Camera (Metal Housing Black)
features: 2.0MP Full HD 1080P Hybrid 4-in-1 TVI/CVI/AHD/960H, day night vision resolution for high quality image;Tri-Axis Mount for Ultimate Flexibility,Power&Video Cable Through Mount Design;Vandal-Proof wire Protection
4 MODES VIDEO OUTPUT - 1080P AHD, 1080P CVI, 1080P TVI and CVBS, compatible with most third party DVRs. With OSD button, you can change signal mode freely and quickly in 5 seconds.
Weather and vandal resistant housing that can withstand the toughest of outdoor conditions; IP66, Metal camera housing
36 high-intensity infrared LEDs,allows up to 100ft night vision;Auto Gain Control (AGC) and Back Light Compensation (BLC) for optimal picture quality in any given lighting condition
description: Basic Technical instruction should note before return
(1)Problem: Camera did not work/did not work with my system
Solution:
Step 1: Connect the camera to power adapter
Step 2: Connect BNC cables between camera and DVR
Step3: If the image is black and white, should adjust OSD cable to change camera’s mode to compatible with DVR system. Please adjust the joystick on camera cables to switch the camera mode.
Operation Mode:
Switch to AHD (Default mode): Press Leftward for 5 Seconds
Switch to TVI: Press Rightward for 5 Seconds
Switch to CVBS: Press Upward for 5 Seconds
Switch to CVI: Press Downward for 5 Seconds
Notes
1.Camera Power Supply DC500mA and Coaxial Video Cables are NOT Included but are Required and Sold Separately.
2.Suggested to connect with HD 1080P DVRs. It can NOT work with 720P/960P DVRs.
3.If cameras’ picture is black and white , should adjust OSD cable to change camera’s mode to compatible with DVR
4.Please kindly contact us at sales@eweton.com for help, don't send back directly
Features:
* Full HD 1080P 2MP resolution for clearer video
* Hybrid TVI/AHD/CVI/CVBS 4-in-1 video output
* Intuitive OSD menu for easy settings
* True Day & Night monitoring with up to 40M/130ft IR night vision
* 3D DNR image processing technology for realistic images
* IP66 weatherproof for indoor/outdoor use in raining/windy/foggy days
Specification:
Image Sensor: 1/3“ CMOS sensor with IR-Cut
Video resolution: 1080P(1920×1080)
Signal mode: AHD/TVI/CVI/CVBS 960H
Lens: 3.6mm, IR LEDs Amount: 48pcs, 5mm LEDs
IR Distance: up to 130ft (40m)
Waterproof Level: IP66
Packaging Contents:
* 1 x 1080P 4-in-1 Bullet Camera
* 1 x Mounting Screws Bag
* 1 x Instruction Manual
